content.text:
Based on the system information, my current file system permissions are:

**Read/Write Access:**
- `/shared/` - Shared storage visible to all agents
- `/home/agent/workspace/` - My private workspace 
- `/home/workspace/repo/` - Custom repository mount (when available)

**Read-Only Access:**
- `/home/` - System files including CLAUDE.md and Claude CLI config

I can collaborate through `/shared/`, work privately in `/home/agent/workspace/`, and access any mounted repositories in `/home/workspace/repo/`.
